data.text: @qldhealth @YvetteDAth This does not represent "serious adverse effects on human health".  I call on @YvetteDAth to end the declared public health emergency.

@monsieur0o @AbsentmindedAus @Palmy833 @qldhealth The critical part to note is "could be". Thus not confirmed or likely. The pharmaceutical narrative's interest is to make this as dramatic as they can.

@AbsentmindedAus @monsieur0o @Palmy833 @qldhealth Minimal prevention VS respiratory diseases, people and esp kids being alienated as they can't read emotion, the cost to society FAR outweighs the perceived "protection" masks have

@Palmy833 @qldhealth At the current 0.01% mortality rate, you "beg" for restrictions? What LALA-LAND are you living? STOP watching news - its fearmongering! Get out and live your life - you're more likely to die of a heart attack!

@sarahgirlwonder @TeresabDB62 @Jinjirrie @qldhealth But what’s the point of badly worn bits of cloth that are worn for days at a time? And we have to wear them forever whenever we leave home? Sorry…PPE has to become personal responsibility for the at risk.

@qldhealth @YvetteDAth Pfizer side effects documents release
Government lied to the people
The govt mandates an unsafe vaccine
https://t.co/QRDWTVxtbJ
@Jelena98410494 @qldhealth Masks do nothing. Follow the science
@RBH58 @TeresabDB62 @Jinjirrie @qldhealth They do but wouldn’t it be nice if others cared about helping them stay safe? It’s not that hard to wear a mask.

@qldhealth Why are the number of active cases always going down despite new daily’s coming in around the 5k mark for over a month? That’s mathematically impossible even when taking recoveries into account. What’s your assumed recovery time? 2 hours?
